name: insinuate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to suggest, without being direct, that something unpleasant is true: [ + (that) ] Are you insinuating (that) I'm losing my nerve? What are you insinuating, Daniel?

to express but not directly state something: What exactly are you insinuating? [ + (that) clause ] She insinuated (that) I’m getting fat. insinuation noun [ C/U ] us
